00039 
00040 Entree& DomaineAxi1d::readOn( Entree& is )
00041 {
00042   const Motcle accolade_ouverte("{");
00043   const Motcle accolade_fermee("}");
00044 
00045   Motcle motlu;
00046 
00047   is >> motlu;
00048 
00049   if (motlu != accolade_ouverte)
00050     {
00051       Cerr << "Error while reading 1D axi domain " <<  finl;
00052       Cerr << "We expected a " << accolade_ouverte << " instead of \n"
00053            << motlu << finl;
00054       Process::exit();
00055     }
00056 
00057   while (1)
00058     {
00059       is >> motlu;
00060 
00061       if (motlu == accolade_fermee)
00062         break;
00063 
00064       if (motlu=="ORIGINE")
00065         {
00066           is >> champ_orig;
00067         }
00068       else
00069         {
00070           Cerr << "Error while reading 1D axi domain " <<  finl;
00071           Cerr << "We expected a \"origine\" instead of \n"
00072                << motlu << finl;
00073           Process::exit();
00074         }
00075     }
00076 
00077   return is;
00078 }
00079 
00080 const Champ& DomaineAxi1d::champ_origine()
00081 {
00082   return champ_orig;
00083 }
00084 
00085 const Champ& DomaineAxi1d::champ_origine() const
00086 {
00087   return champ_orig;
00088 }

00090 const DoubleTab& DomaineAxi1d::origine_repere()
00091 {
00092   return ref_origine_.valeur();
00093 }
00094

00097   return ref_origine_.valeur();
00098 }
00099 
00100 void DomaineAxi1d::associer_origine_repere(const DoubleTab& orig)
00101 {
00102   ref_origine_ = orig;
00103 }
